======Sets marines lobby ready======
= Description =

Controls marines/spectators auto mark as ready in lobby, avoid team leader force-start in 5 seconds to continue the game. 

For example:
* Sets 0, players on matchmaking screens ticks the 'Ready' option manually
* Sets 1, players on gamestats screen ticks the 'Ready' option automatically
* Sets 2, players on matchmaking screens ticks the 'Ready' option automatically
